```{r}
library(lubridate)
library(daymetr)
```

```{r}
download_daymet(site = "College Station Farm",
                lat = 30.537130,
                lon = -96.425917,
                start = 2016,
                end = 2020,
                internal = TRUE) -> w_cs
```



```{r}
w_cs$data %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(date = ymd(paste(year, "01", "01", sep = "-")) + days(yday - 1)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = prcp_mm_day)) +
  geom_col()
```
